display_name: Frequency of violent behavior during sleep, number of episodes per week
description: How often do you have violent or injurious behavior during sleep?
calculation: If par_0610=0 then par_0620=par_0600*7, If par_0610=1 then par_0620=par_0600,    If par_0610=2 then par_0620=par_0600/4, If par_0610=3 then par_0620=par_0600/52
